EmailTemplate.name: LCM Manager Termination Notify
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying about user terminations.
EmailTemplate.Body:
This is an automated email alert from IdentityIQ Lifecycle Manager (LCM).

Employee $userName has been terminated.

This person has been detected to have been on your team, reporting directly to you.

The group of affected Application Owners have been notified as well, so they will be prepared to assist with the off-boarding process.

Sincerely,
Corporate Security and Compliance Office
EmailTemplate.Subject: Team Member termination of $userName

EmailTemplate.name: Terminated Identity Administrator Alert
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying IIQ admin team about termination of identity who is app owner and/or workgroup member
EmailTemplate.Body:
This is an automated notification from IdentityIQ.

$userName has been terminated. This individual is an administrative user and may have
responsibility for one or more applications as well as be a member of one or more work groups.
See below for details.

Directly Owned Applications: $ownedApps

Workgroup Membership: $workgroups

Please make appropriate modifications to the affected resourcees.

Sincerely,
Identity Governance Team
EmailTemplate.Subject: Terminated Identity Administrator Alert

EmailTemplate.name: LCM Application Owner Termination Notify
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying about user terminations.
EmailTemplate.Body:
Hello $appOwnerName,

This is an automated change-detection email alert from IdentityIQ Lifecycle Manager (LCM).

Employee $userName has been terminated.

This user has been detected to have an account in your application, $appName.

According to our records, your application is not automatically provisioned. Please take the necessary steps to disable this user's account, in accordance with corporate policies.

Sincerely,
Corporate Security and Compliance Office
EmailTemplate.Subject: Employee Termination affecting your Application

EmailTemplate.name: LCM Application Owner Termination Notify - Provisioned
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying about user terminations.
EmailTemplate.Body:
Hello $appOwnerName,

This is an automated change-detection email alert from IdentityIQ Lifecycle Manager (LCM).

Employee $userName has been terminated.

This user has been detected to have an account in your application, $appName.

Based upon corporate policy, the SailPoint Provisioning Engine has automatically disabled this account in your application.
You are being notified so that you are aware of this automated response.

Sincerely,
Corporate Security and Compliance Office
EmailTemplate.Subject: Employee Termination affecting your Application
